channel.title: Introduction :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: The World-Wide-Web is a tool that you likely use every day - and itâ€™s being used to deliver you this textbook. There are several core technologies that enable the web to work, and these are the focus of this chapter. Key Terms Some key terms to learn in this chapter are: World-Wide-Web Hyper-Text Markup Language (HTML) Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) JavaScript (JS) Hyper-Text Transfer Protocol (HTTP)
